title: What should I answer if an interviewer asks me about project work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try to categorize your project into various steps and explain in a very crisp way to make them feel one with your project to win the interview. Explain in similar order as given below: Project introductionModules descriptionMain functionalityTools,Technologies and platform usedPersonal contribution and your roleChallenges facedTime taken to complete the projectImprovements in future for the present systemYou can refer this also: “I worked with a 6 person team (4 developers, 1 BA, 1 PM) on the new ACME corporation website, which was created to showcase their Mail Order catalogue. My main role was backend development with PHP, Laravel 5 , MySQL, and AWS services. I was mostly working on the REST API and was in charge of integrating the OAuth 2.0 server into the project, but I collaborated on some specific frontend modules when needed, since I know some AngularJS and HTML as well. The best part (technical, at least) about this project is that I got to learn a lot about ElasticSearch, which I was really curious about. We were able to deploy the first version in 4 months and then continued to improve upon it with feedback from the AB Testing and digital marketing team the client had. Hope this helps! :)
Give them brief overview of what is the project and What language u used to build it and tools used for it And what's the contribution of you towards project
